result.execSummary:
The defendant Israel P. Cruz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Offender-Fail/Update Info (Misd), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(4)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: TO COMMENCE FORTHWITH.  Consecutive to 98-CF-686.  Court obligations are waived.

records.descr: Notice of intent to pursue post-conviction relief

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Israel P. Cruz appeared with Attorney Hilary D. Edwards.  Defendant in custody @ Sturtevant Trans. Facility.  Attorney Angelina Gabriele appeared for the Prosecution.  Court Reporter:  Cyndi Chike.  Clerk: J. Mattner.
MINUTES:  Victim rights compliance.  Defendant entered a plea of Guilty to Misd Sex Offender-Fail/Update Info; found guilty by the court.
Def. sentenced to 3 months incarceration, forthwith, and to run consecutive to 98CF686.  Def. may serve his sentence in prison.  No sentence credit given.  Court costs & DNA surcharge waived.  Appeal rights given.

Defendant Israel P. Cruz appeared with Attorney Hilary D. Edwards.  Defendant in custody @ Sturtevant Corrections.  Attorney Jason Robert Zapf, for Angelina Gabriele, appeared for the Prosecution.  Court Reporter:  Cyndi Chike.  Clerk: J. Mattner.
MINUTES:  Victim rights compliance.  Def. currently serving a sentence at Sturtevant Corrections, 98CF686, and is appealing confinement time.  Defense Attorney requesting an adjournment, needs more time to consider plea offer.  Matter set over, bond continued.  Need writ.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 8, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Hilary D Edwards in court, defendant not in court, in custody @ STF.  Attorney Angelina Gabriele appeared for the Prosecution.  Court Reporter:  Maggie Techert.  Clerk: J. Mattner.
MINUTES:  No writ, def is in-custody at Sturtevant Transitional Fac.  Matter set over, bond continued.  Def atty to let DA know if the def. gets transferred to another facility.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 10, 2014 at 08:30 am.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Br 4 assigned pending approval of 2nd District.
of Judge Wagner filed by Atty. Edwards. Tab pulled for Judge Milisauskas.

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne appeared for the State. Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty. Hilary Edwards. Clerk LE. Case was scheduled for preliminary hearing this morning. State files amended complaint, without felony charges. State moves to strike repeater language from complaint. Court grants motion. Atty. Edwards files request for substitution of Judge Wagner. Request for substitution amended to reflect proper statute. Tab pulled for Judge Milisauskas. Atty. Edwards acknowledges receipt of amended complaint, waives reading and enters not guilty pleas on def.'s behalf. DAPT 1-31-14 @ 2:10pm. Judicial pretrial in Br. 4 on 2-6-14 @ 1:30pm. Bond continued.
Filed by Atty H Edwards.
Atty:  H Edwards.
of Judge (filed in Rm.204 - held pending preliminary hrg - per crt minutes from 1/17/14).  kmk

1:16pm  Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Hilary Edwards. Clerk:LE. Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days, scheduled for 01-24-2014 at 9:30am. Atty Edwards submitted request for substitution of Judge Wagner. The Court gives request back and instructs Atty Edwards to file it after the preliminary hearing. $10,000 cash bond set with conditions (see bond event).

Maintain registration w/ sex offender registry as required.
